name: BABA MURLIDHAR AMBEDKAR SHIKSHAN SEWA SANSTHAN
briefDescription: 	Empowerment of rural community for self dependence(Gram Swaraj),	Capacity building of PRIs, 	Promoting reproductive child care awareness,	Promoting right based safe motherhood, Women health, Education.	Providing a resource team for training,	Purpose in topics relating to child right, education, health, nutrition and creative skills for children.	Developing an information resource for developmental.	Activities through action research, surveys, case-studies .   Documentation, monitoring, evaluation etc.Making efforts in the direction of attaining health.   Security and better health status for mothers and children through generating awareness.Full time 10Volunteers 25
